name: Cops & Robbers (itch)
description:
The game is a 2D platformer, where the player is required to complete a course/run. The objectives are to collect as many coins as possible, before the timer runs out. The player must make their way across platforms while collecting coins and avoiding being caught by the police and other hazards that could cause damage to the players health. The player will make their way to a helicopter at the end of the course, at which point the game is over.

The storyline setting the game, is that there has been an explosion at a London bank, where the money in the safe has been scattered across the streets. The player character is a criminal, that makes an opportunity of the incident. The bank is being patrolled by police teams, that have set up hazardous obstructions to deter people away from the bank, and the scattered coins. The police also have patrolling cars and helicopters. The player must assist the game character in making his way across the level where he has, arranged, a helicopter awaiting his great escape.
